idea:
PERSEA Tyre Sealant

·        DENIAR has developed a unique aqueous gel solution that seals the tyres and avoids any punctures from occurring

·        The solution has to be pumped into the tyre through the nozzle with the quantity depending upon the size of the tyre

·        Once pumped inside, the liquid is distributed throughout the wheel with the help of the centrifugal force when the vehicle moves

·        The solution forms a thin layer in the crown area of the tubeless tyre and prevents punctures up to this depth

·        On occurrence of a puncture in the tyre, the liquid forces itself into the puncture and permanently seals the tyre

·        The motorist continues to drive not even realizing that a puncture has occurred.


Research& Development with IIT-R

 ·        With R&D collaboration with IIT-Roorkee, DENIAR has further improve the sealant performance and benefits

·        2 Patents have already been filed for the PERSEA chemical composition and process.

 

Product Differentiation

·        Single application lasts for almost entire life of the Tubeless Tyre.

·        Improved Spreadibility, Anti-sagging, Anti-Skinning properties result in no additional vibration while driving.

·        Bigger puncture prevention, <10 mm diameter in the crown are of any tubeless tyre.

·        1st “Made in India” OEM grade product.

·        Functions in all weather conditions (currently -15 to 90 degrees Celsius)

·        R&D tie-up with IIT Roorkee


Value Proposition for the end customers

 ·        Seals puncture <10 mm size instantly, while vehicle is on the move, ensuring constant mobility & safety.

·        Only product in the market specifically made for Indian conditions.

·        Improved Safety as punctures in moving vehicles can be fatal at times.

·        Reduces downtime for vehicle and commercial operations

·        Non-toxic,non-inflammable, chemically inert, bio-degradable and safe to use

·        Extends Tyre Life up to 25% by reducing heat build-up and retard aging within casing, thus reductions in tread separations and zipper rupture.

·        Improves Fuel Efficiency & Engine life by reducing rolling resistance.

·        Will not Void Tyre warranty:as product’s chemical composition is compatible with tire components

·        Not just recovers the cost of PERSEA application,but saves money & hassle in many ways. 


Business Segments                                                                               

Auto OEMs, Fleets operators (Trucks, Buses, Cars & SUVs), Industrial, Defense, Paramilitary, Police, Govt., Construction, Mining,Forestry, Agriculture and individual vehicle owners.
name: DENIAR PRODUCTINO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are making easy the search of the various brand of pneumatic products at a single place, and offering the improved quality based on the requirement by users. We are also offering customized requirement fulfillment as per the machinery and the customers involved having machinery and its equipment in different category.
name: PNEUMATIC HOUSE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Beltin Technology Solutions has created an innovative application called Ivy Social which is an information dissemination app. It can be used as a neighborhood bulletin board. Users can get information on local news, upcoming events, public announcements, local offers, local emergency contacts etc. Think of it as a WhatsApp group having everyone in the locality. Users can submit posts to the forum but unlike WhatsApp every post gets reviewed by the moderator before it shows up on the user’s screen. This feature ensures that no objectionable content in the application. This application will enable local small businessmen to advertise their products and services to the residents of the locality in a cost-effective manner. One of the objectives of Ivy Social is to abolish distribution of flyers and leaflets by providing a digital alternative for local advertisement. Service like Ivy Social does not exist presently. It is an innovative product.
name: BELTIN TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
A digital extension for all things scholastic- SchoolHandy is a reliable and effective two-way communication between a school and external entities. Build and nourish school-to-parent communication through SchoolHandy and ensure dynamic flow of information via push notifications and chat forums.
With SchoolHandy it's easy to administer, update, inform and track. It is a comprehensive application that helps you to stay connected via digital communication.
It's not just an app, it's an educational value bridge between the school and the parents that enables effective and better communication which in turn leads to improved academic performance of the child.
name: MOBACCS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Waays Live strives to provide jobs and employment opportunities to job seekers across India. There are a lot of job seekers in India from tier 2/tier 3 cities and towns who have the potential and are looking for jobs, but they are not able to reach the right employer. This is the gap that we aspire to bridge.
name: WAAYS LIVE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: P2P lending, as a product, is fairly new to the Indian market. We intend to connect borrowers and lenders via our platform and help build an ecosystem of social lending in a formalised manner. We envision to improve the entire lending ecosystem by providing an end to end tech enables process. Our strong technological base will enables us to process loan applications within minutes unlike banks and other NBFCs which usually take weeks to do the same. We also plan to have APIs for Aadhar and PAN authentication to validate borrower profile and make the loan process much easier.
name: NDX P2P PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: In terms of innovation, we understand whether the consumer has bought or not bought inside a retail store aggregating IoT & POS Data. In terms of scalabilty, retail as a industry itself is in billions of dollars, so we have the right opportunity in the retail sector to tap the market and grow.
name: INTELITAAP SOLUTIONS (INDIA) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Creating an innovative tool that will give single view analytics of client's online and on-ground engagement by measuring the footfalls and sentiments on-ground and mapping it with media spends online to give a holistic view of media spent for engaging a customer. The tool also measures media share of voice for the client's brand.
name: HYPER CONNECT COMMUNICATIONS LLP

idea: We are looking to improve advisory services in accordance with teaching employees to communicate better in rural area where employment generation could take a big scale as employment in the service we provide is close to non in the area of our work. also the lower middle class is being brought into the system via employment generation
name: DERIVATIVE HEDGERS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
1.	Provide loyalty technology platform (PAAS) to retailers to run their proprietary loyalty, gift or prepaid programs, so that retailers can understand customer data better and can run campaigns to ensure they stay with them. 
2.	Reports, Visual dashboards and a robust campaign management helps them achieve the said retention objective 
3.	Apart from retention, Retailers have a big problem in getting new customers to their stores. Since, we work with multiple retailers, we will use our platform to cross-promote the member data for everyone’s benefit. A common platform is provided to our retailers (customers) to get new customers by providing offers to the entire member base. Such a platform can be accessed through a URL or a mobile app. 
4.	In a PAAS environment and multiple customers, servicing becomes key. Self-servicing modules are provided to the retailers. Apart from that, we service through Whatsapp, thereby cutting the bureaucracy of emails / calling to get work done. This helps help us stand out and ensures that retailers get their work done quicker & easier.
name: BLUE OCKTOPUS TECHNOLOGY SYSTEMS PRIVATELIMITED
